    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ab8a78fb-5037-4610-a8b7-5520746a1e82#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Állítsd össze a képet!</string>
            <string language="en">Put together the picture!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt der Abbildung!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté l'image !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido o retrato!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito l'immagine!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί την εικόνα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Juntado el cuadro!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az erdélyi fejedelmek függetlenségi harcai és a harmincéves háború</string>
            <string language="en">Wars of independence the princes of Transylvania wars of independence and the Thirty Years' War </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, mozaik</string>
            <string language="en">history, mosaic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kriege von Unabhängigkeit die Prinzen der Transylvania 
Kriege von Unabhängigkeit und von dreißig Krieg der Jahre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerres de l'indépendance les princes des guerres de 
Transylvania de l'indépendance et des trente de la guerre années</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerras da independência os príncipes de guerras de 
Transylvania da independência e da guerra dos trinta anos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerre di indipendenza i principi delle guerre di 
Transylvania di indipendenza e della guerra dei trenta anni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επαναστάσεις οι πρίγκηπες των επαναστάσεων της 
Τρανσυλβανίας και του πολέμου των τριάντα ετών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guerras de la independencia los príncipes de las guerras 
de Transylvania de la independencia y de la guerra de los treinta 
años</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, Mosaik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire, mosaïque</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">history, mosaic</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
